The claim: Covid-19 means ‘certificate of identification of vaccination with artificial intelligence’" is a misinformation that has been spread on social media.
The expert: s verdict clarifies that "CO" stands for "corona," "VI" stands for "virus," and "D" stands for "disease."
The number 19 in Covid: 19 reflects the year the disease was identified, which is 2019.
The World Health Organization: WHO) officially named the disease as COVID-19 and the virus as "severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2" or "SARS-CoV-2."
